Class Server

java.lang.Object
model.Server
public class Server
extends java.lang.Object

  • Constructor Summary

    java.lang.String addPrivatePlaylist​(java.lang.String playlistName)
    This method creates a private list and added it to the array.
    pre: the user must be created before he can creates a playlist.
    post: the user will know if he created the playlist, and the method will save the playlist if it was created.

  • Constructor Details

    • Server

      public Server()
      This method creates a server.
      pre: the package model must be imported in the class that it's going to use this method.
      post: the method will create an object type server

  • Method Details

    • addUser

      public java.lang.String addUser​(java.lang.String userName, java.lang.String userPassword, int age)
      This method creates an user to the array with all the users.
      pre: the user must have a name, password, and an age. userName != null, userPassword != null, age != null
      post: the user will know if the new user was created or not, if it was created the method will save this user.
      Parameters:
      userName - : this String saves the user's nick. userName != null
      userPassword - : this String saves the user's password. userPassword != null
      age - : this int saves the user's age. Must be only integers. age != null
      Returns:
      String, this method returns a message to confirm if the user was added or if there were an issue.

    • addSong

      public java.lang.String addSong​(java.lang.String title, java.lang.String artistName, java.lang.String duration, int genreNum, java.lang.String userName)
      This method adds a song to the array with all the songs.
      pre: the user must be created before, and must know the information of the song.
      post: the user will know if the song was added because the program shows a message.
      Parameters:
      title - , this String saves the name of the song.
      artistName - , this String saves the name of the artist/s.
      duration - , this String saves the duration of the song with the format minutes:seconds.
      genreNum - , this int saves the genre of the song.
      userName - , this String it's used to check if the user who wants to save the song exist, or if it doesn't.
      Returns:
      String, this method returns a message to confirm if the song was added, or if it wasn't possible.

    • addPrivatePlaylist

      public java.lang.String addPrivatePlaylist​(java.lang.String playlistName)
      This method creates a private list and added it to the array.
      pre: the user must be created before he can creates a playlist.
      post: the user will know if he created the playlist, and the method will save the playlist if it was created.
      Parameters:
      playlistName - , this String saves the name of the playlist. If the user don't want to rename it, the default name it's "Música para programar." playlistName != null
      Returns:
      String, the method returns a message to let the user know if the playlist was created or not.

    • addPublicPlaylist

      public java.lang.String addPublicPlaylist​(java.lang.String playlistName)
      This method creates a public list and added it to the array.
      pre: the user must be created before he can creates a playlist.
      post: the user will know if he created the playlist, and the method will save the playlist if it was created.
      Parameters:
      playlistName - , this String saves the name of the playlist. If the user don't want to rename it, the default name it's "Música para programar.". playlistName != null
      Returns:
      String, the method returns a message to let the user know if the playlist was created or not.

    • addRestrictedPlaylist

      public java.lang.String addRestrictedPlaylist​(java.lang.String playlistName)
      This method creates a restricted list and added it to the array.
      pre: the user must be created before he can creates a playlist.
      post: the user will know if he created the playlist, and the method will save the playlist if it was created.
      Parameters:
      playlistName - , this String saves the name of the playlist. If the user don't want to rename it, the default name it's "Música para programar." playlistName != null
      Returns:
      String, the method returns a message to let the user know if the playlist was created or not.

    • addSongToPlaylist

      public java.lang.String addSongToPlaylist​(int songToAdd, int targetPlaylist)
      This method adds songs to a playlist.
      pre: the playlist and song must be created before.
      post: the user will know if he the song was added, and the playlist will save the song if it was possible.
      Parameters:
      songToAdd - , this int saves the index of the song that the user wants to add. songToAdd != null
      targetPlaylist - , this int saves the index of the playlist objetive to add the song. playlistTarget != null
      Returns:
      String, the method return a message to let the user know if the song was addded or not to the playlist.

    • addRate

      public java.lang.String addRate​(int playlistTarget, double rate)
      This method adds a rate to a public playlist.
      pre: the playlist must be created before, and must be public.
      post: the user will know if the rate was added, and wath it's the current rate.
      Parameters:
      playlistTarget - , this int saves the index of the playlist to add the rate. playlistTarget != null
      rate - , this double saves the rate that the user gives to the playlist. rate != null
      Returns:
      String, this method returns a message with the current rate if the user choose a public playlist, if he doesn't the message will ask for another playlist.

    • addOwner

      public java.lang.String addOwner​(int targetPlaylist, int targetUser)
      This method adds an woner to a restricted or private playlist.
      pre: the playlist must be created before, and must be private or restricted.
      post: the user will know if the owner was added or if there was an issue. Also the method will save the owner (if it's possible) in the playlist.
      Parameters:
      targetPlaylist - , this int saves the index of the playlist to add the owner.
      targetUser - , this int saves the index of the user to add as owner of a playlist.
      Returns:
      String, this method returns a message to let the user know if the owner was added or not.

    • displayUsers

      public java.lang.String displayUsers()
      This method shows all the users.
      pre: the server must be initializated.
      post: the user will see all the users registred in the server.
      Returns:
      String, this method returns a String with the information of all the users.

    • displaySongs

      public java.lang.String displaySongs()
      This method displays all the songs.
      pre: the server must be initializated before.
      post: the user will see all the songs added to the server
      Returns:
      String, this method returns a String with the information of all the songs.

    • displayPlaylists

      public java.lang.String displayPlaylists()
      This method displaylis all the playlists.
      pre: the server must be initializated before.
      post: the user will see all the playlist created in the server.
      Returns:
      String, this method returns a String with the information of all the playlists.

    • changePlaylistName

      public java.lang.String changePlaylistName​(int targetPlaylist, java.lang.String newName)
      This method changes the name of a playlist.
      pre: the playlist must be created before.
      post: the user will know the new name of the playlist. And it will be updated.
      Parameters:
      targetPlaylist - , this int saves the index of the playlist to change the name.
      newName - , this String saves the new name of the playlist.
      Returns:
      String, this method returns a String to let the user know the new name.
